name: Enviro Managing Completed
description:
Full Enviro Managing Game

As a kid maybe you wanted to grow up fast and be an adult or perhaps you didn't think about it. 

Now you are over 20 years old and you realized that life is much harder than it seems.

 You had to move to find a job, a job requires responsibility and you feel really insecure because you never worked before. 

You have found a position in the city hall as plantation and building manager. What will be the impact of your decisions?

INSTRUCTIONS:

Choose a tile amongst the 3 tiles given for you to choose.

Fill the whole board space with every choice, adding around.

Place them in the way that adding or subtracting you'll make the most  positive (greener) eviromental score in the end!

Enjoy our game!

MADE WITH GODOT ENGINE BY:

Daniel Fernandez       -        Game Design

Gemma  M. Rull    -      Production

Jonatan Galindo              -    Music
